Time- Dusk, the lowering of the sun
Place- The burial site of BioStinger, atop a mountain

 "Voke"..."Maximals"..."Predacons"..."Earth". The thoughts and emotions all 
swirled to life, mixed with a kind of rageful confusion only death could 
bring. Every other moment, the searing truth of possibly being shut-down 
permanently urged him to move on...to keep trying. "I...must...fight..." He 
uttered those words to aid his struggle to live, to surface from his grave. 
"...the Vok...the TransMystiks..." He continued with all his power, moving 
upwards, striving to stay online. "FireStorm...Aquaries..." He felt the 
opening growing wider, pain slashing through his dull optics. Yes...the 
surface...he reached it. With a tired, clenched fist, his shimmering metallic 
fingers bursted through the ground, reaching for the air above his grave. 
"BioStinger...you have proven yourself worthy again. For this, we grant you 
life. Now continue your fight...". That voice, the voice of the Voks mixed 
with his own, flared himself to sheer life, just as night began to fall over 
that lonesome mountain.
